description:
You’ll visit the Greek islands Tinos and Mykonos, bath in Calidario terme Etrusche, see the Chapiteau circus in Malaga and walk on the Embankment in Cannes. 
You’ll enjoy visiting several national parks, go around Budapest, experience the European music culture, 
have a look in the luxurious casino in Monaco, visit interesting museums, ancient castles and much more.

This hidden objects game is full of new and popular touristic places. Use your skills and knowledge to play mini-games and find all the hidden objects.

The Collector's Edition includes:
- 8 additional locations - find even more items and a fun raccoon!
- 8 additional new mini-games + 12 more interesting mini-games
- An album with exclusive postage stamps
- 20 great souvenirs from your trip
name: Big Adventure: Trip To Europe 4 Collector's Edition
